shapes

Class Path

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Path
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class Path
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    This class handles creation of obstacles and moving them.
    Version:
    05.16.2016
    Author:
    Michelle Z. and Waveley Q.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Path(float width, float depth)
      Constructs a path with a width and a depth(distance into the screen from the game's origin)

    • Method Summary

      Calls the act method for every obstacle on the path

    • Constructor Detail

      • Path

        public Path(float width,
            float depth)
        Constructs a path with a width and a depth(distance into the screen from the game's origin)
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the path.
        depth - the distance into the -z from (0, 0, 0)

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        public float getWidth()
        Returns the width of the path.
        Returns:
        the width of the path.

      • act

        public void act()
        Calls the act method for every obstacle on the path
        Postcondition:
        All the obstacles on the path will move towards the positive z

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
        Draws the path.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface Drawable
        Parameters:
        p - the PApplet used to draw the obstacle.
